name: SUPER BEAR PUNCHER 95
description:
So a friend wrote an essay on game feel and in there he mentioned a hypothetical game called "Super Bear Puncher 95", and then i made it real with him in like 2 hours.

Sprites were all done by the friend.

His Twitter: https://twitter.com/mdrndayourobors

His Newgrounds: https://decapitato.newgrounds.com/

Music by Patrick de Arteaga: https://patrickdearteaga.com/chiptune-8-bit-retro/

(kinda runs like garbage in browser so you can download it if you want to play it for more than 2 minutes for some reason)
